members.name: getPrimeSize
members.comment: Returns the size in bits of the prime modulus.

return: the size in bits of the prime modulus

members.name: getExponentSize
members.comment: Returns the size in bits of the random exponent (private value).

return: the size in bits of the random exponent (private value)

members.comment: Constructs a parameter set for the generation of Diffie-Hellman (system) parameters. The constructed parameter set can be used to initialize an AlgorithmParameterGenerator object for the generation of Diffie-Hellman parameters.

param: primeSize - the size (in bits) of the prime modulus.
exponentSize - the size (in bits) of the random exponent.

name: javax.crypto.spec.DHGenParameterSpec
comment:
This class specifies the set of parameters used for generating Diffie-Hellman (system) parameters for use in Diffie-Hellman key agreement. This is typically done by a central authority.

The central authority, after computing the parameters, must send this information to the parties looking to agree on a secret key.
